revised_title: Obituary of Sir James Walker: A Pioneering Chemist and Educator
tldr: The article is an obituary for Sir James Walker, a prominent physical chemist and educator who made significant contributions to the field of chemistry. Walker was a key figure in the development of the classical school of physical chemistry in Great Britain and had a lasting impact on the education and advancement of science. His dedication to his work and passion for teaching left a lasting legacy in the scientific community.
